Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Figure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraphic
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BombGuy, Enemy

    public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGraphic

    • Constructor Detail

      • Figure

        public Figure(int x,
              int y)
        Draws all of the different figures available according to their position. Instance method to create the new figure to be inherited by all subclasses
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the figure
        y - the y-coordinate of the figure
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IGraphic
